Name: Mizutsune Scale+
Description: A high-quality Mizutsune scale. Older scales polished over time can be very valuable.

Name: Mizutsune Purplefur+
Description: High-quality purple Mizutsune fur. More foam-absorbent than its lighter counterpart.

Name: Mizutsune Claw+
Description: Friction-reducing bubblefoam helps this deadly claw slice through prey like sushi.

Name: Mizutsune Fin+
Description: A high-quality Mizutsune fin. Bubblefoam gives it an elegant pattern prettier than dye.

Name: Mizutsune Tail
Description: A flowing Mizutsune tail. It's prized for its supple fur and beautiful scales.

Name: Bubblefoam+
Description: The top layer of the Mizutsune fluid. Removes impurities and is used in many rituals.

Name: Mizutsune Water Orb
Description: A multicolored orb formed from a crystalized Mizutsune scale and bubblefoam.

Name: Mizutsune Certificate S
Description: A Guild certificate awarded to those who have hunted a Mizutsune. Used to make equipment.

Name: Zoh Shia Crystalscale
Description: A crystallized Zoh Shia scale. Its dull glow evinces the great energy it contains.

Name: Zoh Shia Layershell
Description: The coiled nature of Zoh Shia's layered shell looks as though it protects as much as it constricts.

Name: Zoh Shia Stakeclaw
Description: Stake-like Zoh Shia claws extended by hardened Wylk. The Wylkcrystal growths are eerily uniform.

Name: Zoh Shia Crystalhorn
Description: A crystal-coated Zoh Shia horn. Heavy and wedge-like, as though it were used to seal something.

Name: Zoh Shia Crystaltail
Description: A crystal-covered Zoh Shia tail. The crystals continue to grow even after the tail is severed.

Name: Blackember Mass
Description: A small, swollen mass from the inside of Zoh Shia. It pulses with an alien-like quality.

Name: Faux Whitegleam Orb
Description: An inorganic orb from inside Zoh Shia. Something wriggles deep within its elaborate design.

Name: Zoh Shia Certificate S
Description: A Guild certificate awarded to those who have hunted Zoh Shia. Used to make equipment.

Name: Chata Coin
Description: A coin given to those who have bested a Chatacabra in the Arena.

Name: Rathian Coin
Description: A coin given to those who have bested a Rathian in the Arena.

Name: Pinnacle Coin
Description: A commemorative coin bestowed on hunters who have mastered the craft. The value of its sheen? Priceless.

Name: Barrel Bowling Voucher
Description: A voucher for a chance to play a Grand Hub mini-game. Has a whimsical DIY look.

Name: Pick-a-meal Voucher
Description: Exchange this voucher in the Grand Hub Canteen for one order of your favorite regional meal.

Name: Kunafa Meal Voucher
Description: Exchange this voucher in the Grand Hub Canteen for one order of the Kunafa regional meal.

Name: Azuz Meal Voucher
Description: Exchange this voucher in the Grand Hub Canteen for one order of the Azuz regional meal.

Name: Sild Meal Voucher
Description: Exchange this voucher in the Grand Hub Canteen for one order of the Sild regional meal.

Name: Suja Meal Voucher
Description: Exchange this voucher in the Grand Hub Canteen for one order of the Suja regional meal.
